content: In the game of chess, each army has a king, a queen, two bishops, two knights, two rooks, and eight pawns.
translations: ita:Nel gioco degli scacchi, ogni esercito ha un re, una donna, due alfieri, due cavalli, due torri e otto pedoni
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
